Key Match Events: Adam Zampa picked up four wickets, his best bowling at a World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Pat Cummins said his side were never going to let the pressure get to them
Kusal Mendis said the team remained winless and on this occasion, it was clearly the batting that let them down
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Pat Cummins was delighted with the performance and says his side were never going to let the pressure get to them
Kusal Mendis said the team had six more matches and he had confidence in the batting unit to do it better than today
Miscellaneous Highlights: The five-time winners, Australia, live to fight another day
Australia avoid a third straight defeat to begin the World Cup
Others: Adam Zampa was Player of the Match
The Sri Lankan team remained winless
